Uses of Package
evs.data

Packages that use evs.data
evs.analysisunits Store of classes for specifying Verification Units (VUs) and Aggregation Units (AUs). 
evs.analysisunits.scale Scale information associated with a VU. 
evs.data Classes for I/O on forecasts, observations and verification pairs. 
evs.data.fileio Classes for file I/O. 
evs.metric.metrics Verification metrics for the ensemble mean and (ensemble-derived) forecast probabilities. 
evs.metric.parameters Parameters of the verification metrics. 
 

Classes in evs.data used by evs.analysisunits
ConditioningException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signifies a problem performing conditioning.
DataSource
          A simple wrapper class for a data location, such as a file data location.
DateCondition
          A class for specifying date restrictions on a verification unit.
PairedData
          Records a set of paired forecasts and observations.
PairedDataException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
PairedDataSource
          Constructs a file data source for paired data.
ValueCondition
          A class for specifying restrictions on variable values to include in the verification.
 

Classes in evs.data used by evs.analysisunits.scale
InvalidUnitException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
 

Classes in evs.data used by evs.data
Condition
          An abstract base class for specifying conditions to restrict a verification study.
DataSource
          A simple wrapper class for a data location, such as a file data location.
DateElement
          Class for representing a date element, comprising one of: Calendar.YEAR Calendar.MONTH Calendar.WEEK_OF_YEAR Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY The date element may be specified in valid time or forecast basis time (issue time).
FileDataSource
          Constructs a file data source with a single file.
IOState
          A class used to identify the I/O state of an object being read or written.
PairedData
          Records a set of paired forecasts and observations.
PairedDataException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
VUIdentifier
          Class for indexing data by Verification Unit, which stores a unique combination of location ID and variable ID.
 

Classes in evs.data used by evs.data.fileio
ConditionArray
          Convenience class for collating an array of Condition objects and allowing them to be applied sequentially to the input data.
ConditioningException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signifies a problem performing conditioning.
InvalidUnitException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
IOState
          A class used to identify the I/O state of an object being read or written.
PairedData
          Records a set of paired forecasts and observations.
VUIdentifier
          Class for indexing data by Verification Unit, which stores a unique combination of location ID and variable ID.
 

Classes in evs.data used by evs.metric.metrics
PairedData
          Records a set of paired forecasts and observations.
 

Classes in evs.data used by evs.metric.parameters
InvalidUnitException
          Class for throwing exceptions that signify an invalid unit.
